title: Mighty Sam McClain - 2003 - One More Bridge To Cross FLAC
description:
Mighty Sam McClain - 2003 - One More Bridge To Cross

I have a message for you... love one another and you your own self be true." Legendary, international performer and songwriter Mighty Sam McClain has been bringing his own brand of Soul/Blues, Gospel/Funk to audiences for decades. His music brings a progressive sound and delivers his message with a groove that won't quit! The rhythm section backs his compelling vocals, punctuated by the "Mighty Horns", pays homage to his New Orleans roots. Mighty Sam is a solid, seasoned entertainer -- no vices, no frills.
